resources.string: A extreme must be closely lower than B extreme
Insert a right number of parenthesis
Image successfully saved in your gallery

The function s variable must be followed by underscore, e.g.: x_

 We advice you to wrap every single variable in round brackets, e.g.: ((x_)^3)

 Euler Number has the following syntax: e_

 Arc sin, arc cosin and arc tangent functions have the following syntax respectively:

 		 a_sin(), a_cos(), a_tan().

 You can insert two functions and compare their trends into a same domain range.

 You can also use already typed functions by double-tapping function edit-text.

Extremes are required.

 A extreme and B extreme must be floats.

 A extreme must be closely lower than B extreme.

Tap the botton below to show the graph.

 Once the graph is showed:

 	-tap everywhere to get the couple of values (x, y) tapped, 

 	-long press to get special points of the graph.
You denied write external storage permission!
You grant write external storage permission!
Do you really want to exit?
